resources.string: Read the NFC chip of ID Documents and payment cards to securely identify yourself without wasting your time.
üîì Your privacy and the security of your data is our top priority. In line with our mission, the data read is always encrypted and not stored anywhere.
Set AutomatID as you prefer, defining the Identification Methods to be enabled and how errors are to be managed.
Choose how you want errors handled during the identification process.
Whenever an error occurs (e.g.: problems while reading a document or during the liveness check) AutomatID‚Ñ¢ will show an error message asking you to try again.
Whenever an error occurs (e.g.: problems while reading a document or during the liveness check) the AutomatID‚Ñ¢ flow will be closed.
What identification methods do you want to try? (Turn on at least one).
Simulates the reading of a valid card
Simulates the reading of a not valid card

The card scan feature attests that the user has a specific credit/debit contactless card in his hands.
 
You will need to provide an encrypted JWT containing the card data (i.e. PAN, expiration date) of the card that you expect the user possesses. The card will be securely read and verified via NFC. No charges will be done on the card account.
 
For demo purposes, you can test both scenarios (user presents the correct card, user doesn't present the correct card) without providing the encrypted card data.
Your identity has been successfully verified. Please find below the results:
Share JWT Token with the results
Read card data matches provided data
